article_title: How to Drill Down on Dental Costs: Save on Your Next Trip to the Dentist
article_text:
How to Invest Like a Lady: 3 Ways Women Can Get More Out of Their Retirement Portfolios

Women face unique challenges with funding their retirement, and 60% fear they will outlive their savings. Creating an investment strategy is essential, but many women shy away from the task.

article_metadata.description: Finances may be a bigger factor than fear when it comes to avoiding the dentist’s chair. Finding affordable dental care is possible with a little effort.
article_metadata.author: Lauren Lyons Cole
